sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Italy grapples with the influx of migrants on Lampedusa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Will officials confirm European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen will visit the island on Sunday?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Aid groups urge authorities in Libya to stop burying flood victims in mass graves in a bid to stave off disease in the devastated city of Derna.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The EU wants to reform the bloc's fiscal rules and is set to strike an agreement balancing debt cuts against investment over the coming months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In memory of Masha Amini, hundreds of demonstrators gather in the EU's capitals to commemorate the 22-year-old who died in police custody in Iran last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Italian island of Lampedusa is still overwhelmed by an influx of migrants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Authorities say some 2,500 migrants are still staying at its overcrowded immigration centre.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It can house a maximum of 400 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Earlier this week, 8,500 people landed on the Mediterranean isle in the space of three days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: EU officials have confirmed Commission President Ursula von der Leyen will travel to Lampedusa on Sunday after Italian Premier Giorgia Maloney requested she visit. Maloney says the country is under quote unsustainable pressure after Italy's Interior Ministry announced migrant arrivals by sea this year have almost doubled compared to 2022's figures. French President Emmanuel Macron has since pledged to support for Italy while the interior ministers of France, Germany and Italy joined EU representatives for a virtual meeting on Saturday to discuss the crisis. Back on the ground, the Red Cross is continuing to provide essential supplies to the new arrivals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the devastated Libyan city of Derna, thousands of corpses continue to wash up or decay under the rubble,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: following a flood that caused two dams to collapse and swept people to sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The World Health Organization has urged authorities in Libya to stop burying flood victims in mass graves, highlighting the potential health risks if located near water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: waves, highlighting the potential health risks if located near water. More than 11,200 are confirmed dead and around 10,000 remain missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A team of Italian firefighters have been working along the Wadi Durner river valley.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They were among multiple rescue teams still searching for bodies in Libya's eastern city on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Authorities have launched a probe into the collapse of the two dams and several reports now suggest the structures had cracks as early as 1998 which were never repaired. A roadmap for reforming the European Stability Pact.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At an informal ECOFIN council in northwest Spain on Saturday, EU ministers sat down to discuss a compromise on fiscal rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The goal?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: To strike a balance between the need to contain public debt and ensure further investment to fuel economic recovery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: All before October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Volodymyr Dombrovski, the executive vice president of the European Commission, says the plan and ensure further investment to fuel economic recovery. All before October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Volodymyr Dombrovsky, the executive vice president of the European Commission, says the plan is an ambitious one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This has led to reassessment on how to maintain EU's traditional openness while shoring up our economic resilience, how to maintain our standing in a world marketplace and stay competitive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: If an agreement is reached by October, EU member states are expected to come to a technical understanding in November and conclude the process by the end of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Spain's Economy Minister Nadia Colvino says representatives have already agreed to 70% of the new regulations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: 70% of the new regulations. Remembering Masha Amini, the Kurdish-Iranian woman who died in police custody in Tehran

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: last year after she was arrested for allegedly wearing the hijab incorrectly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Hundreds gathered in central London on Saturday to commemorate the 22-year-old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And the French capital demonstrators came together in support of the Iranian people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mayor Anne Hidalgo announced that Amini will be declared as a posthumous honorary citizen to honour her memory and all women fighting for their freedom in Iran and elsewhere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Moving south to Rome, hundreds of people gathered in front of the Iranian embassy, with banners quoting the slogan Women, Life, Freedom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Crowds demonstrated outside the Iranian embassy in Vienna too.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Armed with Iranian flags, protesters chanted Masha Amini's name.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile human rights groups say Iranian authorities prevented Masha's family from holding a ceremony to mark the first anniversary of her death when Brinkley detained her father in his home.
